ABOUT US

This is the official page for the Developer's Community of IIT Bombay. Envisioned as the group of best developers of the Institute, the team is responsible for developing and maintaining InstiApp, and other dev/tech related projects in the Institute.

Projects

Currently open to opportunities within cyber security. Below is a small portion of what I can offer.

Values Driven

Professionalism, integrity, innovation, teamwork, excellence, dedication are my top values.

Time Management

Prioritisation of tasks to ensure deadlines are met.

Social

A good work culture is important. This is built through effectively building work relationships with my team.

Reporting

Experienced writing reports conveying strategic risk based on technical vulnerabilities and exploits.

Results Oriented

Clearly defines outcomes and strives to deliver outstanding results.

Forensic Analyst

Can apply digital forensic techniques across various platforms including Windows, Linux and mobile devices; both host and network.

Empathy

Understanding the organisations and customer needs to work towards the ideal solution.

Incident Response

Can function in the technical or the governance space when responding to cyber incidents.
